params.amount: The amount of tokens to be burned
params.tokenId: The ID of the token type to be burned

params.amount: The amount of tickets to purchase

params.newDefaultURI: The new default URI to be set
params.showId: The ID of the show for which the default URI is set
The ID of the show for which to set the URI
params.tokenId: The token ID for which to set the URI

burnTokens(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Burns a specific amount of tokens, removing them from circulation

purchaseTickets(bytes32,uint256).notice: Purchase multiple tickets for a specific show

setDefaultURI(string,bytes32).notice: Sets the default URI for all tokens

setTokenURI(bytes32,uint256,string).notice: Sets the URI for a given token ID
